text: Ra Anumzamoka Kagra kazana erisga hunka zamazeri haviza hunaku nehananagi, zamagra anazana nonkaze. Kagra zamazeri zamagaze nehunka, vaheka'ama tusizama hunka kavesi nezmantana zana erinte ama hananke'za negesnagenka, ha' vahekama te fanane hanie hunkama retro'ma hunte'nana tevemo ana vahera te fanane hugahie.
